title: Mexican Veggie Bowl ğŸŠ|| 100th Recipe ğŸ˜|| Weekend Special ğŸƒ
content:
Mexican Veggie Bowl: Breakfast/ Lunch/ Dinner Servings: 1 Duration: 40 mins In last month I celebrated my special day with ice cream treat and I posted it was my 100th post but with in few days I found that Only one more recipe left to reach 100 recipes ğŸ˜ So I prepared a special and healthy bowl which is full of nutrition and protein. That's Mexican Veggie Bowl it's my favorite meal I had ever. I'm so much happy to share to all my loved followers and friends this is my second milestone in just 3 months. Coming to my 100th recipe on my food blog,Â I inspired by chipotle restaurant where I had first time chipotle burrito Veggie Bowl. So I made some changes in the dish with Veggie toppings and avacado Spread which is super healthy. Nutrition facts: Red kidney beans:Â Kidney beans are a good source of several vitamins and minerals, such as molybdenum, folate, iron, copper, manganese, potassium, vitamin K1 and phosphorus. Lemon juice: It contains vitamins A & B6, iron, calcium, magnesium, Potassium & protein Bell peppers: ItÂ contains vitamins C & B6, iron, calcium, magnesium, Potassium & protein Brown Rice: It contains vitamin B6,Â iron, calcium, magnesium, Potassium & protein Sweet corn:Â It contains vitamin C, iron, magnesium, Potassium & protein Avacado:Â It contains vitamins A, C & B6, iron, calcium, magnesium, Potassium & protein Spinach:Â It contains vitamins A, C & B6, iron, calcium, magnesium, Potassium & protein Today, I prepared Mexican Veggie Bowl with salsa, avacado, bell peppers, brown rice and more. Let's start with ingredients and follows Procedure Step 1:Beans Ingredients: Red kidney beans - 80 gms Grated garlic clove - 1 Oregano - 1/2 tsp Salt - 1/2 tsp Pepper - 1/2 tsp Procedure:
  • I took red kidney beans you can also use black beans
  • Soak 80 gms of red kidney beans overnight
  • Boil in pressure cooker for 1 whistle and pinch of salt
  • Starin water in a cup keep it aside
  • Heat pan add cooked beans, strained water, grated garlic clove, chipotle powder, cumin powder, salt and oregano ğŸŒ¿
  • Mix well
  • Let the beans soak in the flavours for 2 mins
  • Turn off Cooktop and take out in a bowl
  • Keep it aside
Step 2:Â Veggies Ingredients: Red Onion - 1/2 - sliced Green Bell Pepper - 1/2 - sliced Yellow Bell Pepper - 1/2 - sliced Olive oil - 1/2 tb sp Salt & Pepper - 1 tsp Procedure:
  • Heat skillet pan over medium heat
  • Add oil, red Onion
  • Saute 2 mins
  • Add chopped bell peppers
  • Saute more 2 mins till they are nice & tender
  • Add oregano, salt & pepper powder
  • Mix well
  • Take out in a bowl
  • Keep it aside
Step 3: Salsa Ingredients: Seedless tomato - 1/2 - finely chopped Red Onion - 1/4 - finely chopped Cilantro - 2 tb sp - finely chopped Grated garlic - 1 - clove Lemon juice - 1/2 tb sp Salt & pepper - 1 tsp Procedure:
  • Take a bowl add chopped tomato
  • Add onion, clintro, grated garlic clove
  • Mix well
  • Next add salt, pepper powder and lemon juice
  • Mix well
  • Keep it aside
Step 4: Sweet corn Ingredients: Boiled sweet corn - 80 gms Salt - 1/2 tsp Lemon juice - 1 tsp Procedure:
  • Boil sweet corn for 10 mins in hot water with pinch of salt
  • Drain water
  • Now add salt & lemon juice
  • Mix well & Keep it aside
Step 5: Avacado SpreadÂ  Ingredients: Ripped Avacado - 1/2 - Mashed Red onion - finely chopped - 1 tb sp Cliantro - 2 tb sp - finely chopped Salt - 1/2 tsp Lemon juice - 1 tsp Procedure:
  • Take a bowl
  • Add ripped avacado ( mashed ), onion and cilantro
  • Mix well
  • Next add salt & pepper , lemon juice
  • Mix well
  • Keep it aside
Step 6: Brown Rice Ingredients: Brown Rice - 1/3 cup - 120 gms Water - 360 ml Cliantro - 3 tb sp - finely chopped Salt - 1 tsp Lemon juice - 1 tb sp Procedure:
  • Wash twice & soak brown rice for 1/2 an hour
  • Add 1 cup = 3 cups of water
  • Now cook rice in rice cooker
  • Rice cooked well
  • Take some rice in a bowl , add cilantro, salt & lemon juice
  • Mix well
  • Keep it aside
[caption id="attachment_6691" align="alignnone" width="3264"] Rice & toppings ready. All set ğŸ˜€[/caption] Step 7: Leavy vegetables Ingredients: Spinach - 15 leaves - chopped Actually, in Mexican Veggie Bowl adds lettuce for topping. Right now, I didn't have lettuce so replaced with Spinach ğŸƒ Mexican Veggie Bowl: Procedure:
  • Get set altogether
  • Take a burrito bowl/ any bowl available at home
  • Add one layer of brown rice
  • Add prepared toppings on rice one by one
  • Add avacado Spread at center
  • Garnish with spinach
[caption id="attachment_6655" align="alignnone" width="1020"] Step by step process[/caption] [caption id="attachment_6654" align="alignnone" width="1462"] Mexican Veggie Bowl ğŸ˜€[/caption] Note:
  • Toppings you can create your own as you like, it can be anything
  • It's completely customizable
  • Instead of brown rice you can also use normal rice
